DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate compare immunogenicity Eutravac ( Diphtheria-Tetanus-acellular Pertussis [ DTaP ] Hepatitis B [ HB ] combine ) vaccine separate simultaneous administration DTaP HB vaccine administer healthy infant , measure seroprotection/vaccine response rate 4-8 week post-final immunisation .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study Assess Immunogenicity Safety Eutravac ( DTap-HB Combined Vaccine ) With DTaP Hepatitis B Vaccines Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: Were healthy , male female infant bear full term pregnancy ( ≥37 week ) birth weight ≥2.5 kg mother negative HBsAg serology , document prior give birth per routine , sitespecific antenatal care procedure . Signed parental legally acceptable representative 's informed consent obtain Evidence acute febrile illness axillary temperature ≥37.5℃ day vaccination . Infants symptom minor illness eg , mild gastroenteritis , mild upper respiratory tract infection temperature ≥37.5℃ day vaccination could include Investigator 's discretion History diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis hepatitis B disease History vaccinerelated hypersensitivity anaphylactic reaction previous administration Euvax B
